channel.title: NEED SERIOUS HELP! i want to create a "pkbox"
channel.description:
ok, how do i do it? i have if ((absX >= 5601 && absX <= 5651 && absY >= 2654 && absY <= 2704)) now is the absX mean its the X axis?
i need serious help. i looked through all the tutorials and there confusing if you make me/get me a tutorial that i can do, and it works with no errors, i'll thank you :)

item.title: NEED SERIOUS HELP! i want to create a "pkbox"
item.dc:creator: @skatelifemanager skatelifemanager
item.description:
@skatelifemanager wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:5, topic:168650”](absX >= SW && absX <= NE && absY >= SW && absY <=NE

SW = SW X Coordinate

NE = NE X Coordnate

SW = SW Y Coordinate

NE = NE Y Coordinate

SW = SouthWest

NE = NorthEast[/quote]

ok
this is what i have

public boolean NonWild() { if((absX >= 3105 && absX <= 3111 && absY >= 3695 && absY <=3699 )) return true; else return false; }
wtf is going on?
what am i missing
im out in the wilderness,trying to make a safezone,and this doesn’t work.
im in a safezone, and i want to make a wildernesszone, and it doesn’t work!
can someone give me a pre-written script where all i have to do is add the coords?

Read full topic
item.source: NEED SERIOUS HELP! i want to create a "pkbox"

item.title: NEED SERIOUS HELP! i want to create a "pkbox"

item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

(absX >= SW && absX <= NE && absY >= SW && absY <=NE

SW = SW X Coordinate

NE = NE X Coordnate

SW = SW Y Coordinate

NE = NE Y Coordinate

SW = SouthWest

NE = NorthEast

item.title: NEED SERIOUS HELP! i want to create a "pkbox"

item.description:
@hippyss wrote:

[quote=“skatelifemanager, post:3, topic:168650”]there, changed, and don’t post useless posts.
anyone?[/quote]Like that one?
Ontopic: yes absX is your current postion on the x axis (your x coordinate)
